title: The Castle Town Blacksmith
description: The Blacksmith is an npc that can upgrade your unbreakable weapons using the power of souls you find around Hyrule. The power of these souls will degrade until you upgrade the weapon with a boss soul, so until then you will degrade in levels around 100 hits.
location: Can be found around the south-east section of the Castle Town ruins.

title: The Phoebist
description: The Lamp Vendor is an npc that sells 4 unique lamps.
location: Can be found in the Black Market (And eventually all over hyrule)

title: The Alchemist Qosmo
description: The Potion Vendor is an npc that sells 3 new potions, 3 new elixirs, and 9 resins to enchant your weapon. (Will expand upon this information when the character is released.)
